appendix.title: Troubleshooting the Upgrade Process
appendix.para: This appendix helps you through some basic debugging and troubleshooting during the upgrade process.

qandaset.title: Solutions to Common Upgrade Issues
qandaset.para: This section provides information for possible issues you may encounter during your upgrade.

question.para: I've upgraded OpenAM, now my tools are not working properly. What happened?

answer.para: Every OpenAM component will need to be upgraded, not just the main OpenAM .war file. If you did not upgrade the tools too, they may not work as intended.

question.para: I'm trying to upgrade to , but I do not see the file to upgrade my ssoSessionTools.

answer.para: Starting with OpenAM 10.1.0, session failover has been simplified and the ssoSessionTools are no longer required.
